Girobusan | IMP!

IMP! Theme, based on Typebase CSS

This theme is based on Typebase CSS. Here you see only basic stylesheet without any additions. SImple, clean, readable. This style gives good sizes and whitespace proportions.

To install this theme:

  1. Download css (right click on link, choose "save as")
  2. Save it where your IMP! page is.
  3. Open IMP! page for editing.
  4. Navigate to the bottom of the editor
  5. Fill the CSS name in View CSS location field
  6. Save page
